channel.description: Enable device rules Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Note: Doc is for embedded solutions Links to original docs: - Device Context Overview: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/device-context/aspnet/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
